name: queryOracleDbV1
description: Retrieves an array containing summary information about the Oracle database objects in the Rubrik cluster.

name.description: Filters a response by making an infix comparison of the database name, SID, and tablespaces in the response with the specified value.

sla_assignment.description: Limits the response to Oracle databases that are protected by the specified type of SLA Domain assignment.

effective_sla_domain_id.description: Filters by effective SLA Domain ID.

primary_cluster_id.description: Limits the response to Oracle databases that have the specified primary cluster value.

is_relic.description: Limits the response to Oracle databases that have the specified isRelic value.

is_live_mount.description: Limits the response to Oracle databases that have the specified isLiveMount value.

limit.description: Limits the summary information to the specified number of matches. Optionally, it can be used with offset to begin the count of matches at the number specified in the offset parameter, and with sort_by to sort the results by the specified attribute.

offset.description: Determines the elements to include in the response starting with the element at the index number specified here. Optionally used with limit to enable paging of the results by retrieving a smaller number of elements in the response.

sort_by.description: Specifies a comma-separated list of attributes to use in sorting the matches. Performs an ASCII sort of the values in the response using each specified attribute, in the order specified.

sort_order.description: Specifies the ascending or descending order to sort the elements in the response by the attributes specified in the sort_by parameter.

include_backup_task_info.description: Specifies whether to include the backup task information in the response.

is_data_guard_group.description: Limits the response to Oracle databases that have the specified value for the isDataGuardGroup flag.
